item.title: CVE-2024-0687|2024-03-13T15:27:25.636Z -- intoxstudio -- Restrict User Access – Ultimate Membership & Content Protection
item.description: The Restrict User Access – Ultimate Membership & Content Protection plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 2.5 via API. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to obtain the contents of posts and pages via API.
